languages.text: "Я заметил{mf||а}, любовь к живописи находит свое отражение и в вашей речи. Столь много образов вы связываете с цветами и красками".

traits.locale_text: "Я заметил{mf||а}, любовь к живописи находит свое отражение и в вашей речи. Столь много образов вы связываете с цветами и красками".

languages.text: "I noticed that your love of painting is reflected in your speech as well. You associate so many images with hues and colours."
languages.original_text: "Я заметил{mf||а}, любовь к живописи находит свое отражение и в вашей речи. Столь много образов вы связываете с цветами и красками".

traits.locale_text: "I noticed that love for painting finds reflection in your speech as well. You associate so many images with hues and colors."
"I noticed that love for painting finds reflection in your speech as well. You associate so many images with hues and colors."
"I noticed that your love of painting is reflected in your speech as well. You associate so many images with hues and colors."
"I noticed that your love of painting is reflected in your speech as well. You associate so many images with hues and colors."
"I noticed that your love of painting is reflected in your speech as well. You associate so many images with hues and colours."

languages.text: “我注意到，你对绘画的热爱同样反映在你的言谈中。你会把许多意象与颜色联系起来。”
languages.original_text: "I noticed that your love of painting is reflected in your speech as well. You associate so many images with hues and colours."

traits.locale_text: “我注意到，你对绘画的热爱同样反映在你的言谈中。你会把许多意象与颜色联系起来。”

languages.text: «Me he fijado en que su amor por la pintura también se refleja en su habla. Asocia mucho las imágenes con tonos y colores».
languages.original_text: "I noticed that your love of painting is reflected in your speech as well. You associate so many images with hues and colours."

traits.locale_text: «Me he fijado en que su amor por la pintura también se refleja en su habla. Asocia mucho las imágenes con tonos y colores».

languages.text: 「お前の絵画が好きだという嗜好は、言葉にも反映されているようだ。お前は多くのイメージを色合いや色彩から連想する」
languages.original_text: "I noticed that your love of painting is reflected in your speech as well. You associate so many images with hues and colours."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の絵画が好きだという嗜好は、言葉にも反映されているようだ。お前は多くのイメージを色合いや色彩から連想する」

languages.text: "Mir ist aufgefallen, dass Eure Liebe für die Malerei sich auch in Eurer Sprache widerspiegelt. Ihr verbindet so viel mit Farben und Schattierungen."
languages.original_text: "I noticed that your love of painting is reflected in your speech as well. You associate so many images with hues and colours."

traits.locale_text: "Mir ist aufgefallen, dass Eure Liebe für die Malerei sich auch in Eurer Sprache widerspiegelt. Ihr verbindet so viel mit Farben und Schattierungen."

languages.text: « J'ai remarqué que votre amour de la peinture transpirait dans votre façon de parler. Vous associez systématiquement des nuances et des couleurs à tout ce qui se passe. »
languages.original_text: "I noticed that your love of painting is reflected in your speech as well. You associate so many images with hues and colours."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai remarqué que votre amour de la peinture transpirait dans votre façon de parler. Vous associez systématiquement des nuances et des couleurs à tout ce qui se passe. »

languages.text: "Ressamlık sevdanın, konuşma tarzına da yansıdığını fark ettim. Gördüğün çoğu şeyi renklerle ve renk tonlarıyla bağdaştırıyorsun."
languages.original_text: "I noticed that your love of painting is reflected in your speech as well. You associate so many images with hues and colours."

traits.locale_text: "Ressamlık sevdanı konuşma tarzına da yansıttığını fark ettim. Gördüğün pek çok şeyi renklerle ve renk tonlarıyla bağdaştırıyorsun."
